data.prayer: Father, move the 16,575 believers in the county of Dharmapuri to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dharmapuri, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Dharmapuri to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 16,575 believers in Dharmapuri.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, help the 16,575 believers in Dharmapuri to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Malayan, caste people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Malayan, caste people.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Dharmapuri, Tamil Nadu, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Dharmapuri.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dharmapuri, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 1,506,800.

We estimate Dharmapuri has 16,575 people who might know Jesus, 18,282 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,471,943 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 16,575 believers in Dharmapuri and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
